General.Name: Monnari Trade S.A.
General.Description: Monnari Trade S.A. engages in the design, outsourced production, marketing, and sale of clothing products and accessories for women in Poland. It sells its products under the MONNARI brand through its network of stores and online. The company was formerly known as MONNARI s.c. and changed its name to Monnari Trade S.A. in 2000. Monnari Trade S.A. was founded in 1998 and is based in Lodz, Poland.
